attributes.additional_details: this would give a better understanding of public oppinion
attributes.background: Review Gov petitions system to allow for people voting against a petition as well as for a petition. This would show a better understanding of public oppinion. At present anyone who has a strong oppinion against a petition has no vote.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334158
